column5: Is it just me or can anyone else not find anything on their usual Boxing Day sale.  G
I was looking for that,  No good deals for me again this year
Really quite disappointing. Not that I was planning to brave Vaughan Mills mall on Boxing day (did it once and never again!!!)
The ONLY good thing that EVER came outta that mall (aside from BASS PRO)... It gives all the LOCAL MILFS a place to CONGREGATE.
i went last year on boxing day, it was stupid busy. waited close to an hour to check out and they had every counter going.  i\d stay home and go another day
thanks skeeter. Doesn't look worth the line-ups/hassles of Boxing Day crowds for me

Amen. Plus the ladies around 19+ I was almost   Lucky for me the girlfriend doesnt care if i look  She even points 'em out if i happen to miss one  I went lastyear and got there 15mins before they opened and found a good spot. This year with a new truck id stay away.
